volunteer_experience.info: The Mozilla Reps program aims to empower and support volunteer Mozillians who want to become official representatives of Mozilla in their region/locale.The program provides a framework and a specific set of tools to help Mozillians to organize and/or attend events, recruit and mentor new contributors, document and share activities, and support their local communities better.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Mozilla
volunteer_experience.title: Representative

honors_and_awards.title: Forbes Asia Under 30
honors_and_awards.description: Got featured under Social Entrepreneurship category for Forbes Asia Under 30 list of year 2020.

honors_and_awards.title: 35 Under 35- Best Startup In Education
honors_and_awards.description: For having been chosen to be on the 35 Under 35 List 2018 Madhya Pradesh under Best Startup in Education Category for GirlScript Foundation.

honors_and_awards.title: India's Top 100 Young Leaders Award 2017
honors_and_awards.description: Top 100 Young Leaders Award is a coveted recognition for those few, who decided to 'Be the Change' they wish to see in the world. It is going to be presented at an Award Ceremony conducted by Indian Youth Festival 2017 at MTV Cafe, New Delhi.

honors_and_awards.title: Amul Vidyashree Award
honors_and_awards.description: Anubha won an award from Amul (India) for academic excellence.
